%T A061315 21,7,1,3520,247456,37324,1870,161,28,8,1,1551880
%N A061315 Array read by antidiagonals: T(n,k)=T(n,k-1)*(T(n,k-1)+k-1)/k with T(n,1)=n.
%C A061315 Not always an integer
%F A061315 a(n) =A061314(n, k-1)/k
